subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*g-rjum}}. The Min forms point to a fricative initial in {{etyl|zhx-min-pro|-}}: *''ziem'' (“a white encrustation formed from saltwater or brine”).
